content.raw:
While doing the bandwidth logging tutorial, I noticed that the /tmp/bandwidth.log file just looks like a huge block of numbers. It would be nice if the beginning of the file had some comments the describe the fields, as is given in the tutorial. Something like this:
~~~
# This is a log of bandwidth usage, including time stamps and a summation
# of inbound and outbound kilobytes of bandwidth
# router_time  /clock   inKB  outKB
~~~
content.html:
While doing the bandwidth logging tutorial, I noticed that the /tmp/bandwidth.log file just looks like a huge block of numbers. It would be nice if the beginning of the file had some comments the describe the fields, as is given in the tutorial. Something like this:

# This is a log of bandwidth usage, including time stamps and a summation
# of inbound and outbound kilobytes of bandwidth
# router_time  /clock   inKB  outKB
